response.original_title: David Gilmour - On An Island (Surround Sound Version)
response.overview: The 5.1 Surround Sound version of *On an Island* by David Gilmour is available as an audio-only DVD in Dolby Digital and DTS. This version was released as part of the deluxe 4- and 5-disc editions of the live album *Live in Gda≈Ñsk* from 2008. The surround mix was created by Andy Jackson, a longtime sound engineer for Pink Floyd, together with David Gilmour himself. The DVD features the full album in 5.1, with discrete elements such as backing vocals, orchestrations, and guitar accents subtly distributed across the surround channels.
response.title: David Gilmour - On An Island (Surround Sound Version)
